referenceGuide: It is important to cite all reference sources in the required format in this file. Proper citations will help you avoid unnecessary trouble with regard to academic integrity. Additionally, citing resources that you referred to can also be helpful as it documents your learning process and can aid in recalling the material when revisiting the project later, such as when you are preparing for job interviews. Citing resources does not excuse copying code. Read the course and university policy statements in this regard. If you discuss ideas with others, limit the discussion to block diagrams and arrows. Do not look at another students' code. When editing this file, read the JSON semantics and you may want to make use of JSON validator from the Internet if needed.

websites.title: JavaReedSolomon
websites.code: ReedSolomonEncoder.java: line 19, line 49; ReedSolomonDecoder.java: line 18, line 57
websites.description: create method: Generate a Reed-Solomon object which enables erasure coding and decoding of file data; encodeParity method: Based on file data, generate parity data; decodeMissing method: Given a number of file data shards, recover any missing shards
